title: [REUPLOAD] Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 FullBurst MAC
description:
Live the 4th Great Ninja War and its overpowering boss fights or defy your friends in ultra dynamic online and offl ine ninja confrontations! Originally released in March 2013 for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 to wide critical and fan acclaim, NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 has been given a thorough overhaul for its FULL BURST comeback! The "ULTIMATE" Ninja Storm 3 edition features many new enhancements and additional content, including the feverishly anticipated chapter where Sasuke and Itachi take on Kabuto in a nail-biting confrontation.

Now, the xbox controller is fully working as you can see in this video:

Also, the game is in spanish, to change it go to:
Open content package on the wrapper-->Contents--->Resources--->drive_c--->Program files--->Namco Bandai Games--->Naruto...--->STEAM_API

Inside steam_api: When the text finish you will find:
UserName=RLD!

###
### Select your language here if available
###

Language=spanish<---change it!

Inside the folder you need to download the pass from the web that I put inside.

I hope you will enjoy it.
		
DONT FORGET TO KEEP THE TORRENT TO SHARE WITH OTHERS!!!
